entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' in the text. He is described as bending over the Pensieve and falling through darkness.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who is standing with Harry in a memory, mentioned as 'Dumbledore' in the text. He is described as pointing ahead of them to a tall figure.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: A younger version of Dumbledore, mentioned in the text as 'Albus Dumbledo re'. He is described as having long hair and beard that are auburn.

entities.name: london street
entities.description: A bustling, old-fashioned London street where Harry and Dumbledore find themselves in a memory. It is described as having a horse-drawn milk cart.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are standing together in a memory, as described in the text: 'he and Dumbledore were standing in a bustling, old-fashioned London street'.
Harry is looking at a younger version of Dumbledore, as described in the text: 'This younger Albus Dumbledo re's long hair and beard were auburn'.
Dumbledore is also looking at a younger version of himself, as described in the text: 'This younger Albus Dumbledo re's long hair and beard were auburn'.
